English.name: Music bot package

English.shuffleVote: {} out of {} people voted for enabling shuffle mode
English.repeatVote: {} out of {} people voted for switching repeat mode
English.stopVote: {} out of {} people voted for stopping the bot
English.errorChannelNotFound: You're not connected to any channel!
English.errorNoBotInChannel: Bot isn't connected to your channel! Use "connect" to connect

Successfully connected to your channel.
You can use bot in {}
English.connectionErrorNoFreeBotsOrPermissions: Connection error: No free bots or permission error.
English.connectionErrorNoFreePlayers: Connection error: No free player channels available
English.errorAlreadyConnected: Connection error: Already connected to your channel!
English.channelNotFound: You're not connected to any channel
English.statusBotNotAdded: This bot isn't on server. You can add him by this url:
English.statusURL:
https://discordapp.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id={}&permissions=322039040&scope=bot 
If you already added him, wait up to 10-20 seconds for initialization.

Russian.name: Music bot package
